channel.title: Jarring
channel.description: When I jarred my file on one comp, I sent it to the other comp, and it didn't work. It said something like "Could not locate the main class file: client. Program will exit." It worked fine on the comp I jarred and signed it on, but when i tried it on my other comp, it had an error and wouldn't open.

item.title: Jarring
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

Coder Eddie:

theres a bunch of turts bro…

I jarred it and it worked on one computer, and it worked for one of my MSN friends. Just not my laptop.
